detail_desc: Knee-length skirt in airy chiffon with a high, elasticated, ribbed waistband. Lined.
Knee-length, A-line skirt in a sturdy weave with a slight sheen. High waist and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Knee-length, A-line skirt in a sturdy weave with a slight sheen. High waist and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Calf-length leggings in stretch, lightweight denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and slits at the hems.
Patterned top in crinkled jersey. Flutter sleeves with overlocked edges, and an overlocked hem.
Patterned top in crinkled jersey. Flutter sleeves with overlocked edges, and an overlocked hem.
Shorts in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Set with a pair of shorts and a top. Denim shorts with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Printed jersey top.
Calf-length, voluminous balloon skirt in cotton poplin. Regular waist with covered elastication and concealed side pockets. Lined.
Dance leotard in glossy jersey with a tulle frill on the shoulder straps, gathers at the top and a seam at the waist with a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.

Biker jacket in supple imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front and stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a ribbed elastic panel underneath and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Biker jacket in supple imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front and stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a ribbed elastic panel underneath and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with flounces down the front that continue down the back. Small opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs.

Coat in soft felted fabric with a faux fur-lined collar and faux fur trim at the cuffs. Covered buttons at the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Cropped trousers in pleated jersey containing glittery threads. Regular, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Short, fitted T-shirt in soft fabric with a round neckline.
Short, fitted T-shirt in soft fabric with a round neckline.

Knee-length shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. Large coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and back pockets. Hammer loop at the back of one leg and a double pocket at the back of the other leg.

Knee-length shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. Large coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and back pockets. Hammer loop at the back of one leg and a double pocket at the back of the other leg.

Knee-length shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. Large coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and back pockets. Hammer loop at the back of one leg and a double pocket at the back of the other leg.
Knee-length skirt in a sturdy weave with a regular waist, decorative metal eyelets on the waistband, a concealed zip at the back and a sewn-in wrapover and slit at the front.

Weekend bag in nylon with two handles at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap in a contrasting colour. Zip at the top and three smaller inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Depth 21 cm, height 35 cm, width 42 cm.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a sewn-on bow tie and double-layered front with a sewn-on waistcoat in a linen blend. Waistcoat with a press-stud on one shoulder, buttons down the front and a fake chest pocket. Shorts with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a decorative button, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Shopper in imitation leather with details in real suede. Two handles at the top and concealed ties inside the short sides. One spacious, zipped outer compartment and a small inner compartment. Studs on the base. Unlined. Size 9.5x31x33.5 cm.

Shopper in imitation leather with details in real suede. Two handles at the top and concealed ties inside the short sides. One spacious, zipped outer compartment and a small inner compartment. Studs on the base. Unlined. Size 9.5x31x33.5 cm.
Wide, ankle-length jeans in washed, lightweight cotton denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.

Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.

Slightly shorter, boxy jacket in soft, washed cotton twill with a collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud concealing two handwarmer pockets. Adjustable tab with a metal buckle at the sides of the hem. Unlined.

Slightly shorter, boxy jacket in soft, washed cotton twill with a collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud concealing two handwarmer pockets. Adjustable tab with a metal buckle at the sides of the hem. Unlined.

Shirt jacket in woven fabric containing some linen and cotton. Stand-up collar with a tab and button, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a round neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a round neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Long-sleeved jumper in a bouclé knit with a roll-edge neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length trousers in a bouclé-look rib knit. Regular waist with covered elastication and straight, wide legs.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, buttons at the back of the neck, an open back with ties at the hem, and long puff sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, buttons at the back of the neck, an open back with ties at the hem, and long puff sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.

Short, high-waisted skirt in patterned cotton twill with front and back pockets, flap patch pockets at the sides and a zip fly and button. Unlined.
Short wrapover skirt in soft cotton twill. High waist with a concealed button and sewn-in belt with metal rings, and patch pockets with a flap and press-stud. Unlined.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in softly draping satin with a high waist, shaping darts at the back, concealed zip in one side and a gentle flare at the hem. Unlined.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.

Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft rib knit with a round neckline, narrow shoulder straps and slits in the sides.

Short-sleeved dress with a sewn-in bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a decorative picot trim around the neckline and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Skirt in double-layered tulle with shimmering spots. Sewn-on bow at the waist.

Calf-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and frill trims with overlocked edges at the top and pockets. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back with a button at the top, seam at the waist and straight legs.

Calf-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and frill trims with overlocked edges at the top and pockets. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back with a button at the top, seam at the waist and straight legs.
Polo shirt in jacquard-patterned premium cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.

Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a deep round neckline, decorative buttons down the front and short sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Short lace dress with a V-neck and detachable shoulder straps made from plastic beads. Discreet zip in one side,a seam at the waist with an inset band, and a gently flared skirt. Lined.

Knee-length dress in mesh made from recycled polyester with embroidery. V-neck and a frill trim at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Bodice with embroidered details decorated with glass and plastic beads and sequins. Seam at the waist with an elasticated satin band and a gathered, softly draping skirt with a raw-edge hem. Lined.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Relaxed fit with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. Keyring with a chain and carabiner hook.

Long-sleeved tunic in airy patterned chiffon with frills at the front and a small opening with a covered button at the front of the neck. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and a seam at the waist and hem for added width. V-necked underdress in jersey made from recycled polyester with adjustable shoulder straps.

Long-sleeved tunic in airy patterned chiffon with frills at the front and a small opening with a covered button at the front of the neck. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and a seam at the waist and hem for added width. V-necked underdress in jersey made from recycled polyester with adjustable shoulder straps.

Narrow elastication at the cuffs and a seam at the waist and hem for added width. V-necked underdress in jersey made from recycled polyester with adjustable shoulder straps.
Swimming goggles in tinted plastic with frames and decorative appliqués in silicone, and an adjustable silicone strap at the back.
